sentences.en: Of course, this power of idealization is the great gift of genius.
sentences.cn: 自然, 这种理想化的能力是一种伟大的天赋.

sentences.en: Others — cosmology, for example — make hypotheses that are more remote from everyday causes, and involve a high level of mathematical abstraction and idealization.
sentences.cn: 另外一些——比如说宇宙学——则对远离日常生活的一些事情做出假设，然后通过很高级的数学技巧加以抽象和理想化。

sentences.en: Performs the idealization the reality in person, but produces the new artistic style.
sentences.cn: 将现实中的人加以理想化, 而生成新的艺术风格.

sentences.en: The idealization of rural life was very misleading.
sentences.cn: 对农村生活的理想化非常具有误导作用.

sentences.en: We should have ideals, but should act sure - footedly. We should fall into idealization.
sentences.cn: 我们要有理想, 但做事要踏实,不能理想化.
